snippet.title: Ruined King: A League of Legends Story | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
RISE AGAINST RUIN

The fate of Bilgewater is in your hands, and looks like you've got quite the squad to back you up. Watch the official first-look at gameplay for Airship Syndicate and Riot Forge’s Ruined King: A League of Legends Story now. 

Stay up to date:
Twitter (@riotforge)
Facebook(@RiotForge)
Instagram (@RiotForge)

Ruined King: A League of Legends Story is coming to consoles and PC in 2021.

Learn more about Airship Syndicate: http://www.airshipsyndicate.com/
Learn more about Riot Forge: https://riotforgegames.com/
